name: Dolly Doctor Playset - Baby Dress Up Care Free - Games For Kids
name_original: Dolly Doctor Playset - Baby Dress Up Care Free - Games For Kids
description:
It's time to become the baby doctor! In this game you can choose from 4 cute little babies who are waiting for your attention and care to help them get better!

~ Featuring amazing realistic tools such as toothbrush, tissues, medicine and even diaper changing!
~ Listen to baby's heartbeat, and use important tools such as stethoscope, x-ray and blood pressure sensors!
~ Use Bandages and plasters, all with fun and cute designs!

So, with many many more fun activities involved, it's time to download this and help baby get better!
